GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of all articles with a given article_id

article.title: They're not exactly dogs, are they?
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments from a given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to an article for a given article_id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment for a given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article for an article_id to be incremented by the value of inc_votes

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge
